Description:
3 Bedroom Cream Brick
Situated on a good size corner allotment this very solid well located home includes lounge, kitchen-dining, gas cook top and HWS. 3bedrooms, bathroom, laundry and single garage. The home is an ideal First home offering great potential for cosmetic improvement or excellent investment being currently let at $250pw, however vacant possession is available. Located in Cahill Street just past Weeroona College in a very popular residential area.

Description:
Great Value Doesn't Last Long!
Here's a neat & well presented home that with a little spruce-up & some paint around the edges - it would absolutely shine. Situated in a quiet street, close to schools & the White Hills Botanic Gardens, it's ideal for a young couple, downsizers or as an investment. A double carport has gates through to the backyard where there is a lovely large space for the kids & pets. The open plan living area is zoned into kitchen, with an upright gas stove and breakfast bar, meals and lounge area with exposed beams featuring here and in both bedrooms. Timber-look floors add a warm note as well as being easy to clean. The lounge room has a gas wall heater and there's a wall-mounted air-conditioner in the kitchen. The two bedrooms have built-in wardrobes and nearby is a 3 piece bathroom and separate toilet. Out the back you have a great with a lovely undercover entertaining area and a garden shed.
Luke Goggin Real Estate - "We Get Results"

Description:
Want To Downsize?
Easy to live in, easy to maintain and offers all the comforts for a safe and comfortable retirement. Features ducted cooling, split system air conditioning, dishwasher and a great outdoor entertaining area, garage, workshop and double carport. This delightful brick veneer home is located in a quiet cul de sac only a short drive to central Bendigo and in walking distance to White Hills shops and the delightful botanical gardens. If you need to downsize, but are not keen to live in a cluster style unit development, you will love this retirement size home.

Description:
Developers and investors take note
Sale by Set Date 8/4/2014
This beautifully presented, neat property will excite all buyers from the spacious, brick home with period features, the sensational location and the massive approx. 1200sqm block.
With a large lounge, separate dining/second living space with wall heater and rcac, spacious kitchen and three great sized bedrooms, this home has beautiful features throughout including polished floorboards, ceiling roses, detailed cornices and picture railings.
Outside continues to delight with an enclosed sunroom, paved patio, double carport and single car garage/shed. A hop, skip and a jump from the White Hills Primary School, Botanical Gardens and Lake Weeroona, this property is in a highly sought after area on a block with immense potential. Ideally suited for development, but offering fantastic scope for a family home with a huge backyard for the kids.
Be sure not to miss out on this one!
Bill Williams : 0477 277 562

Description:
Vivacious Victorian
The picket-fence gate opens to an old-world garden were there have been some changes to this more than 100-year-old weatherboard residence but to the uninitiated it's still a beautiful example of a Victorian home. Pine floorboards and ceilings, stained-glass windows, original panelled doors and timber architraves imbue the rambling interior with a lovely organic feel. A wide central arched hallway takes the eye from front door to back, it has been freshly painted throughout, spacious lounge with open fireplace, farm-style kitchen's new appliances & gas ducted heating and evaporative cooling throughout. Three of four very large bedrooms have open fireplaces with decorative timber surrounds, the most ornate being in the main bedroom which has built-in wardrobes as well. A fabulous art deco mirror adds a glamorous note to the cream-tiled bathroom. Outside there's an inviting undercover, elevated deck offering treetop views across White Hills and down on to the large backyard with its shade trees and lawn. A combined double carport and shed has concrete floor & power. Close to CBD and an easy walk to Weeroona College this beautiful Victorian will excite buyers.
Insights: 11 other 4 bedroom house in WHITE HILLS have recently been sold.

Description:
Complete Contemporary Renovation
Here is a fantastic opportunity to purchase a residence that has been renovated throughout with impeccable contemporary taste. Upon inspection you will feel as though you are walking through a new home that is hidden behind a very neat weatherboard facade in a quiet court location. With polished timber flooring and new carpets, the plan comprises 3 bedrooms, open plan kitchen/meals and living plus a separate lounge room. Stunning modern colour schemes have been used with the kitchen featuring quality stainless steel appliances and bathroom complete with shower, vanity and bath. External attributes include a generous 732m2 allotment, established backyard and single lockup garage/workshop.
Darryn O'Keefe : 0418 509 563

Description:
Stylish, Comfortable & Immaculate.
There is nothing left to do but move in & enjoy this stylishly fully refurbished 3 bedroom home. Enter the L shaped lounge, through to the bright modern kitchen with gas cook top, under bench oven, D/W & adjoining meals area. The main bedroom has an ensuite & WIR , the other two bedrooms both have BIR.s. Recently renovated family bathroom. Sliding doors lead out to a paved patio with delightful water feature. Fully landscaped gardens, fabulous undercover tiled BBQ area, 2 garden sheds & a single carport. Close to schools, bus, Botanical Gardens & just short drive to Epsom Village & the CBD.

Description:
A Superb Gem in Topaz Avenue
Step into this magnificent Metricon home and you will never want to leave. Barely two years old, this four bedroom, three bathroom home has had no expense spared in the build and is located in the prestigious Peppercorns Estate.
With a grand entrance, the excitement levels soar as you take the tour. The master bedroom features a walk-in robe, double built-in robe and immaculate ensuite with double shower and vanity and a separate toilet. The front bedroom includes a powder room with toilet which is currently used as a home office. Two other bedrooms are hidden away with their own private rumpus room and main bathroom featuring a massive spa bath; a great retreat for the kids!
A great family room with beautiful timber glass doors is the perfect play room for the kids or could serve as a theatre room. The light-filled, open plan living/kitchen and dining area continues to delight with beautiful Caesar stone bench tops, a mammoth walk-in pantry, 900mm oven, pendant lights and double-glazed windows. This beautiful tiled area has sliding doors leading out to the outdoor entertaining area and landscaped yard with garden shed, amazing sheltered outdoor spa, vegetable garden and rear access.
With more features than we have room to list, the property also includes refrigerated air-conditioning, ducted heating, fans, downlights, DLUG, plush carpet and with a massive 5kw solar system on the roof you'll never have to worry about a power bill again!
Bill Williams : 0477 277 562

Description:
Impeccable Presentation, Close To It All
Located a short distance to the Bendigo Base Hospital, schools, shops, Lake Weeroona and plenty more, this home is marked by warmth and offers low maintenance living at its best. Ideal as a first home, investment or a downsizing option this brick veneer home presents welcoming domains in a highly sought after location. Neutral colour tones inside and out, it features three bedrooms master with an additional small sunroom ideal for reading/relaxing in the morning sun, serviced by a central bathroom, a comfortable lounge room plus an open plan kitchen meals and family area, good heating and cooling throughout, established garden with secure yard, single width carport with additional caravan port. The home truly presents exceptional low-maintenance living just moments from leading amenities. Certainly a home you can pack up and leave, or enjoy the comforts but with little maintenance giving you peace of mind.
Insights: 1 Koomba Street, WHITE HILLS VIC 3550 was last sold in 2013 and 40 other 3 bedroom house in WHITE HILLS have recently been sold.

Description:
A Perfect Start - In A Great Court!
Situated in a quiet, well presented Court, you will be pleased to call this 3 bedroom property "home." Recently painted throughout. separate lounge with air conditioner and gas wall furnace, kitchen-meals has plenty of room with views of the court. single garage with light and power and enclosed yard. Located within easy proximity to schools and a quick drive to town, both owner occupiers and investors will find this property appealing. Description:
White hills Gem
Sale by Set Date 17/12/2013
This beautifully presented, 18 month old, modern brick home is a rare find in the heart of White Hills. This property offers ample living spaces with an open plan kitchen/living and dining area featuring a large island bench, pendant lights, an abundance of cupboard space and large walk-in pantry, quality blinds and modern fixtures and fittings. A separate family room with access to the great timber deck is perfect for the summer barbecue. With three great sized bedrooms, master with walk-through robe and large ensuite with double vanity and private outdoor retreat, the property also features a great double lock up garage with internal access, low maintenance and neatly landscaped gardens and evaporative cooling and ducted heating. A stone's throw from shops, schools and parks, property's of this calibre are far and few between.
Photo ID Required
Bill Williams : 0477 277 562

Bendigo Investment 2 Units
We have one here for the astute investor, located a short 5 minute drive from the Bendigo CBD are these 2 modest brick veneer units on a single title. Estimated rental of each unit of around $200 per week and offering vacant possession, we have qualified tenants suitable to move in now

Description:
VALUE FOR MONEY IN WHITE HILLS
Set well back from the main road,in a quiet location yet close to the Botanical Gardens, White Hills Swimming Pool, Bendigo Golf Club & the Bendigo Racecourse.
Move straight into this original yet well-kept brick veneer home offering 3 bedrooms, 2 with BIRS & main with WIR, kitchen is neat with gas cooking, 2 good sized living areas, separate dining area, bathroom with shower, bath, vanity, laundry includes an extra shower and toilet.
Outside provides a garden shed, single carport with roller door, 4mx4m outdoor entertaining area + a 3.5mx3.5m entertaining area adjoining the carport.

Description:
Opposite White Hills Botanical Gardens
Set opposite the picturesque White Hills Botanical Gardens, this is a fantastic opportunity for investors, developers and retirees looking to value add, with two separate dwellings both currently let, 74 Napoleon for $230pw and 74a for $150pw for a total of $380 per week.
The front property is a California bungalow with two bedrooms, all gas appliances, high ceilings, stained glass windows, two R/C air-cons and a very generous main bedroom and lounge.
The rear property is a solid BV, one bedroom unit with separate lounge, gas appliances, built-in robe and a separate kitchen.
Both are serviced by a 2 car carport and storage shed, plus there is room for another unit (S.T.C.A).
Close to Holy Rosary Primary School, 5 minutes to Central Bendigo and in a quiet street, this is a fantastic opportunity to value add in a great location.
Damien O'Shannessy : 0417 055 593

WHAT A CRACKER
Priced to sell! This fantastic White Hills position offers a Victorian home, well built with charming character features. You will feel instantly at home the moment you enter! The open plan living/Kitchen is well appointed with gas hot plates, pantry & all modern conveniences. Reverse cycle heating and cooling for year round comfort. Currently tenanted for $320 per week, this is an excellent investment for the future, in one of Bendigo's prime central suburbs. Here's an opportunity not to be missed.

Description:
Excellent Family Home.
Close to schools , shops, sporting facilities and other amenities ,this superb modern home only approx 5 years old, displays taste, style and quality throughout. From the large entrance through to the stately dinining room or family room, into the huge kitchen, casual dining and large lounge overlooking the rear private yard. There are 3 large bedrooms, full ensuite & WIR in main with BIR's in other rooms plus a 4th bedroom or large study. Ceiling fans in all rooms, ducted evap cooling, ducted evap heating, high ceilings, loads of natural light, attractive window shutters and double garage with auto door. Just new on the market, will not last long.

Description:
Quiet Court In Sought After White Hills
This neat and tidy brick veneer is located in the very desirable area of White Hills within walking distance to Weeroona College offering primary and secondary schooling. The home is impeccably presented and has been well looked after over time. Comprising 3 bedrooms with BIR's, the main bedroom is spacious and has a large robe space and all are located near by the bathroom. The sizeable lounge area flows through to the dining and kitchen area, exit the sliding doors you can escape into the manicured back yard. Heating is via a wall mounted heat bank and a new wall mounted air-conditioned for the summer months has been installed. Inspection will not disappoint.
Judy-Ann Cantwell

Description:
Exclusive Family Home in Peppercorns Estate
Sale by Set Date 6/8/2013
This exceptional, elevated property is located in the beautiful and exclusive Peppercorns Estate. Only a few years old and built by a prestigious local builder, the floor plan was designed perfectly for a corner allotment. Featuring enormous living spaces, the home is ideal for the growing family and impresses at every turn. The front entrance leads to the large formal lounge which is the perfect parent's retreat, a great study with private porch and the executive master bedroom behind double-doors with walk-in robe and magnificent ensuite. The spacious kitchen features exquisite silestone bench tops, plenty of cupboard and counter space including a large walk-in pantry, Blanco stainless steel appliances and 900mm oven. The kitchen opens out to the mammoth living/dining area that takes full advantage of the natural light with an abundance of windows and glass doors to outside. With a further three great sized bedrooms with built-in robes, main bathroom with spa, additional powder room and spacious laundry with ample storage. Extra features include ducted heating and cooling, plush carpet throughout and quality curtains and blinds. With a beautiful outdoor entertaining area, landscaped gardens and retaining walls, double lock-up garage and rear access with space for the boat or trailer this modern day mansion has so much on offer.
Bill Williams : 0477 277 562
